```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
# Read the data

player1 <- read.csv("Data/player-6607011.csv")
```

```{r}
player1 %>% filter(!is.na(player1$total_points)) %>% 
  select(player_points, total_points)
```

```{r}
naProportion <- (colMeans(is.na(player1)))*100

plot(naProportion)
```
